title: model: Define class 'TrackItemView'
message:
model: Define class 'TrackItemView'

In our database, item categories are maintained in a
separate table. The category 'symbol' isn't directly
accessible to the adapter classes.

This class represents 'resolved' view of the item.
As of now, this means that category-id is resolved
to corresponding symbols.

This object shall be initialized via SQL 'join' query.
Hence, only getters are implemented.

Signed-off-by: Sanjeev Premi <spremi@ymail.com>

title: activity: item-list: rv-adapter: Add & use 'itemClickListener'
message:
activity: item-list: rv-adapter: Add & use 'itemClickListener'

Added member 'itemClickListener' and associated setter.

The click event shall be handled by this listener object,
if available.

The setter is expected to be called from the fragment
containing recycler view (associated with this adapter)
that implements the ItemClickListener interface.

Signed-off-by: Sanjeev Premi <spremi@ymail.com>

title: app: Add interface 'ItemClickListener'
message:
app: Add interface 'ItemClickListener'

This interface is specifically created to handle
click event on items in the recycler view within
the 'ItemList' fragment.

Since, list of items in the adapter is provided
by the fragment, position of 'clicked' item can
be used to identify the corresponding item in
the fragment implementing this interface.

Signed-off-by: Sanjeev Premi <spremi@ymail.com>

message:
activity: item-detail: fragment: Fetch tracking information

database.

be used as a sort key.
